metadata.title: Live In Tokyo
description: Out of print in the U.S.! CD reissue of this 1972 live album from the Jazz/Fusion supergroup featuring Wayne Shorter, Joe Zawinul and friends. Features five lengthy jams which are variations on tracks from theie first two studio albums. Sony/BMG.
